Edmodo makes it simple to track student progress. All marks and badges assigned or awarded through Edmodo are stored and easily accessible. Redesigned to find all the relevant content you need to power up your classroom. Look up "Digital citizenship" to witness a supercharged search in action.
It's a bird! It's a plane! It's the faster, more reliable search.

Welcome! Now you can connect to all your classes in one place. %1$s%1$sTo join existing groups, just click the + icon on the left side of this screen and enter the code provided by your teacher. Once you're in, you'll be able to access every group you belong to right here, no additional accounts or sign up required. %1$sNow if only your homework was this easy!
Welcome to Edmodo! %1$s Let's set up your classroom, it only takes a minute. %1$s Start by creating a group for you and your students and you'll be on your way. %1$s Sincerely, %1$s The Edmodo Team

Url should contain an encrypted Json string containing the needed user data. "Not going with a traditional LMS turned out to be a great decision, not just from a fiscal standpoint, but also in terms of teacher satisfaction and usage. Welcome to %1$s online portal. If you haven't created your account yet, do so to the right.

Securely centralise and sync all of your resources in an exclusive environment that only your members can access. With a dynamic repository, Edmodo makes it easy to discover, collect, and share valuable content that augments lesson plans and supports learning objectives.
Edmodo sets everyone in your organisation up for success.

Using the same functionality that gets individuals connected, Edmodo makes it easy to strengthen connections throughout an entire organisation. With tools designed to increase collaboration and communication, discover how the world's leading education platform can help you engage your educators in even more meaningful ways.

Streamline organisation-wide professional development by using Edmodo to distribute materials, award badges, and foster best practices. Have an app that drives your development? Edmodo can install it for your members and grant automatic access to everyone from the start.
Other students that have earned this badge:
Our award-winning Support team is full of former educators who know first-hand what it's like to work in a classroom and understand that even the smallest changes can make a big difference.
Our community makes it easy to connect with other members, collaborate to improve outcomes, and discover valuable resources.

In late 2008, Nic Borg and Jeff O'Hara recognised the need to evolve the school environment to reflect the increasingly connected world. The two set out to create a tool that closed the gap between how students live their lives and how they learn in school. Watch this video to learn more about the history of Edmodo.
At Edmodo, our goal is to help educators around the world harness the power of social media to customise the classroom for each and every learner.

The Edmodo Apps PD package is designed to support the following learning outcomes for teachers:
Improved awareness of the value and scope of high quality digital content (apps)
Increased knowledge of how to access educational apps and use them to teach common core standards in ways that are personalized, engaging and effective
Increased capacity to integrate educational apps as part of a blended learning approach

A learning game that aligns with GCSE Maths objectives. Engage your students by offering both single and multi-player activities that are personalised to address individual student needs in an exciting format.
Watch your students improve their writing through creative and meaningful ways as they learn about other countries and cultures, while meeting new friends along the way.
Constellation Caper introduces key concepts in astronomy. Students explore an interactive comic book as secret agents to uncover clues and solve curriculum driven puzzles.

Partners can now upload free or paid items to our Spotlight marketplace. Read more about the %1$s Spotlight %2$s. Please read about the distinction below because our TOS prohibit listing apps as Spotlight items. Questions? Email the apps team at %3$.
For partnership inquiries, content providers and education companies can contact: %1$s

Edmodo Insights integrates brand new Cambridge University Press content for the reformed linear GCSE qualifications. A formative assessment tool with a high quality bank of questions and quizzes aligned to the new curriculum for KS4 Maths and English Language, Insights helps teachers create mini-assessments and delivers valuable progression data in an instant.]

As a third-party publisher, you can leverage the reach of the Edmodo network by bringing your premium content to Spotlight. From classroom materials to PD resources, Spotlight makes it easy to share items across key stage and subjects.

The safest and easiest way for teachers to connect and collaborate with students, parents, and each other.

"Safety is of utmost importance for administrators in modern schools, and Edmodo is doubtless one of the safest internet learning platforms available. It's no wonder other schools are raving about its features and capabilities for both inter- and intra-school communication and collaboration. In my own distance-learning projects through Edmodo, my students have enjoyed collaborating with students at great distances and I've felt secure that they were safe from online intrusions. If that had not been the case, I would never have committed to an online learning setting."

Edmodo Snapshot takes the guessing out of assessing – quick, easy, and free!
Edmodo Snapshot is here to help take the guessing out of assessing and regularly gauge student progress – quickly, easily, and for free!
Take this sample Snapshot and experience it from your students' perspective. This is how an assigned Snapshot will appear in their post stream.

When you create a Snapshot for your students, you can choose the objective(s).
Demonstrate command of the conventions of standard English capitalisation, punctuation, and spelling when writing.

Read questions carefully. Once you submit an answer, it's permanent; no there’s no going back or having another go.
Stay focused. It'll be tempting to switch to another tab or screen, but this will be shown on the report for your teacher.
Take notes. It might help to work out your answer on a piece of paper.

Started in September 2008 and officially launched in September 2009, Edmodo is a social learning network for teachers, students and schools on the Web. Teachers and students worldwide use Edmodo every day to connect and collaborate in a secure, fun environment. Our free network offers a safe and easy way to post classroom materials, share helpful links and videos, and access homework, marks and school-wide notices.

Set up safe and secure online classrooms where it's so easy to assign homework, post quizzes, and more, it'll seem like your very own superpower. %1$sLearn More.%2$s

Edmodo parent and carer accounts make sure whatever you teach during the day gets reinforced at night by getting entire families involved in learning and inviting them to see:

Whether you're new to Edmodo or want to get to know it better, we have a team dedicated to your success. From our Help Centre, where you can learn more about our features and account types, to our Support Community, where you can ask direct questions, it's easy to get (or give) Edmodo tech expertise in an instant.
Need ideas for GCSEs? Just ask; our global community of educators will share resources in minutes. No matter what your key stage and subject area, we've got you covered.

With intuitive features, unlimited storage and the ability to create groups, assign homework, set quizzes, manage progress and much more all on one platform – Edmodo reinforces and enhances what you're already doing in the classroom.

Give students new ways to engage, participate, and express themselves. With Edmodo, you can post discussion topics, conduct polls, award badges, and more, to foster communication and make learning social.

Edmodo is designed to give you complete control over your digital classroom. With tools that let you determine who can join groups, ensure they remain private, and monitor member activity, safety is built right in.

Whether you want to create a paperless classroom, nurture digital citizenship skills, integrate educational content into your teaching, or grow your professional learning network, you can personalise how you use Edmodo.

Technology is powerful and can effectively change the future of education. We believe in the cause of enhancing student learning. We're passionate about it, we're committed to it, and we believe we can accomplish better learning outcomes and protect student privacy at the same time.

Today, Edmodo is based in San Mateo, California. Thanks to those who guided and supported us in the beginning, we're now the number one primary and secondary social learning network in the world, dedicated to connecting all learners with the people and resources they need to reach their full potential.
